body.name: ROYAL MATRIX Women's Winter Coats Fleece Lined Parka Jacket Hooded Long Winter Warm Parka Coat with Pockets
features: Care instructions Machine wash cold separately, do not bleach. Iron it at maximum 230°F if needed

【Cold Fighter】The water-resistant and windproof fabric of the womens winter coat retains more body heat without sacrificing breathability. Full Faux-fur lined hood and body enhanced the warmth. Attachable hood with a detachable faux-fur trim and drawcord can better protect your head from cold. The ribbed cuffs can perfectly block the wind out

【Multiple Pockets】2 side entry fleece lined chest pockets with snap closure, 2 dual entry hand pockets with warm fleece lining and 1 zipper inner pocket can warm your hands and safely storage your essentials

【Better Show Your Beauty】Adjustable waist drawstring of the winter parka coat can better show your graceful curves. Mid-length design can cover your bottom and thigh. The cozy and fashion sherpa lined parka could keep you warm while still flattering your figure

【Available in Multiple Sizes】This warm parka coat has multiple sizes for you to choose from, so you can pick the one that best suits your figure. Please refer to our size chart for a suitable and comfortable size for yourself or other important people
【Long-lasting Use】The long winter coat features a high quality 2-WAY SAB METAL ZIPPER, which is durable and convenient to wear when walking and driving

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Faux-fur Lined Attached Hood attached hood with removable faux-fur trim provides extra warmth Durable Ribbed Cuffs keeps cold air out and prevent heat loss Windproof Front Flap metal full-zip and snap closure help to keep the cold wind out 1 Inner Zipper Pocket keep your important personal items safe Adjustable Waist Drawstring offer a better fit and creat a chic, elegant look Next page 1 WARM HOOD 2 RIBBED CUFFS 3 WINDPROOF FRONT FLAP 4 INNER POCKET 5 WAIST DRAWSTRING

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty and warm!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice coat! It's heavy and warm. I love the soft lining on the inside of the coat as well as the pockets. I like that the fur lining on the hood can be removed, as the hood is rather big with the fur. The coat is long enough that it partly covers my thighs, and it's roomy enough to wear layers underneath. The zipper can be challenging to zip up, but if you do it slowly, it works fine. I got the forest green color, and it is really pretty. Overall, I am very happy with this coat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super nice coat!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t wait for it to get cold to try this out! It is so warm, and well made. The waist cinches up with the draw up clasps, that’s a cool feature. So many pockets and a hidden one inside. You can remove the hoodie too. Note- I measured myself and followed the chart for fitting instructions. Perfect fit! I am a normal size 8/10 and I ordered a size 12. I’m so glad I did. I have plenty of room and yet it’s snug and not too big. One of the nicest coats I’ve ever owned ☺️.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy!
reviews.reviewText: Very warm and cozy. It gets frigid here, and this coat can handle the cold. Its so toasty. I love the length and the faux fur lining. Super cute. Plenty of room for sweaters or hoodies underneath. The zipper issue some have - just have to get it lined up, and it's fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great coat for the price
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this coat because it's actually going to feel like winter this year in my state, and also because it was on sale. I decided on the green, and I'm pretty happy with my choice. There are only a couple issues with the coat.The first thing I noticed is that the green isn't as dark as in the picture. It's more of a forrest green, as opposed to a really dark green. It's still pretty, though not what I originally wanted. The other problem is a bigger issue. The zipper sticks, and sometimes pretty badly. It's hard for me to get it to go up some days, which is extremely frustrating. The zippers on the pockets don't stick, just the one on the front, but that's the main one. I will say that the hood is very large, and while I like that, I know some people don't.What I do like is that the lining is super soft and the coat is very warm. I love that the (numerous!) pockets are lined with fleece, too!I would recommend this coat, and I'm happy I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Coat for the price, like the look and feel.
reviews.reviewText: I order this coat in a size 22, I wasn't sure if I should order the 20. I wanted something I little more room to put a hoodie on. Either way the size for both came out to a 2x plus women's size. It gave me a great fit when I got it and put it on. So, it's true to size. I'm 47" 48" 53" at 220lbs. if you want to go by that. I will say it fit like on the model around the hips and legs on me...loose and roomy. I will be taking of the fur. The pockets have warm mitten lining for your hands, that's a must have I like. The coat is great and I also like the cuffs on the sleeves. BUY THIS COAT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft and seems warm
reviews.reviewText: Nice and warm. I bought a 20 and it fits good but i do feel it seems a tad tight in the shoulders.To move up a size, the overall fit will be to large. I am keeping it i do like it very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THIS COAT!!!
reviews.reviewText: Literally the best coat I've ever owned! It is absolutely perfect in every way. I live in Kansas and this winter has been miserable. I hate heavy coats but finally broke down and found this one and thought for the price I might as well, and I am not disappointed!! It is perfection!! I'm 5'3" around 215lbs, I bought the size 22 and it fits perfectly! It's so soft on the inside, warm but not too hot. And ladies...IT HAS SO MANY POCKETS!!!!!! Seriously, buy it. Shut up and give them your money lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Zipper is of poor quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, and roomy pockets, the hood is very handy. On the downside, the coat came horribly wrinkled. I washed the coat, and hand pressed out as many wrinkles as I could. It is somewhat less wrinkled, hoping it will improve with time. I can tell the zipper will fail within a short amount of time. I do have some sewing skills and am sure I will need them for replacing the zipper at some point. I kept the coat despite these issues, don't really sure why?! Likely because it is a cute style. Just poor quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my daughter and she loves it. It’s warm and fits perfectly. I got her the Large (size 12) and she still has ample room to wear a hoodie underneath. Very flattering, especially with the ability to cinch in the waist. She loves the liner inside and says it’s so soft. She did say she wishes it went all the way down through the coat, though. Pockets are deep and have a soft and warm liner as well. We had a very cold snap here (-45 Celsius) and she helped shovel the snow from our sidewalk and driveway, she said she stayed very warm!

The media could not be loaded. So I'm 5'4, 100lbs and this coat fits perfect.I ordered the black upgraded, size 2.Not sure why other reviews say go a size up, that's not the case for the one I ordered.The sleeve length is on point.The hood is deep but not too deep, and it has a draw stringThe fur isn't top quality, but it is soft and looks decentThere are 6 pockets on the outside front of the coat; one on each side of the upper that have snaps to close, and two on each side of the lower, one with a snap and one with a zipper. The pockets are fair size and comfy.There is another pocket on the inside left that zips upThe buttons and zippers all seem to be solidThere is a string at the waist to sinch up to give the coat more of a form fit, which I did, if there was no option to sinch the waist, then the coat would almost be too big for someone with my frame .... almost.Inside the coat is a really soft material.I wouldn't be able to wear a heavy sweater under this coat, but doubt if I'd need to as it feels pretty warm, despite it being so light weight.I like the length overall, it's not really boxy and doesn't fan out but I have enough room to move, walk, drive, etc.The outer material is good too.I am confident this coat will keep me toasty whenever winter decides to come back to Calgary, AlbertaShipping was very quick too.Yeah, it's a keeper.**additional review update**I'm very happy with this coat, I've washed this coat 3x already (removed the fur,cold-warm water,normal cycle/soil level,extra spin,all zippers zipped/buttons snapped,tie each hood drawstring in a knot to avoid it coming out)the extra spin cycle is importantTurn inside out before putting in the dryer on medium heatLike new! Didn't affect the inner material at all.It shrunk a VERY TINY bit, hardly noticeable, now that it's broken in it fits and feels even better. I love all the pockets!!This coat ROCKS I've been rocking it out here on the acerage south of Calgary, AB Last week it was a hard to the core in -37(not with the windchill!!) With only a tank top under it. It's SO warm. HIGHLY RECCOMMEND!! I'd give it 10 stars if I could

Wasn't sure after some of the reviews. But I sure like that it is such a warm coat but is not too bulky. The length is perfect - just past the thighs & ever so slightly longer at the back.The waist cinch hits me right at the waist. The 2 way zipper is great although stiff at first - takes a few tries to get it going but fine after that. The fur was crushed but can be fluffed. On sale it was a great deal. Very happy with it. I have tried on lots of name brand jackets this season - this is by far the best fit & feel. Warmth without bulk. Very happy I took a chance on this.

This coat is really nice, Fast shipping, I love the colour, the weight is good, not too heavy but warm and cozy on a cold Canadian winter day. I walked my dog on a -15 day with -20 windchill and was sweating by the end.It was a little wrinkled when it arrived so I had to steam it but it came up beautiful. Zipper quality is good, I like that they are silver, nice contrast on the dark grey.My only dislike is the faux fur on the collar is a little ratty and cheap looking and I do prefer to leave the fur on but I'd rather faux fur than the real thing so not a big issue. I would recommend buying this coat.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great fit, very warm, high quality!
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous to order a jacket online but after reading the reviews, I jumped at this one and am glad I did! It’s absolutely beautiful! Lots of pockets, zips up and down, high quality material, warm fur lining! Very happy with the fit as a plus sized woman!
